elements.label: Season of Wanderings
elements.description: Where will my footsteps take me? When the weather turns like this, I always get the urge to explore.

elements.label: Season of Heartache
elements.description: That old wound begins to ache.

elements.label: Season of Reckoning
elements.description: When the past comes take stock of me.

elements.label: Wanderlust
elements.description: Without new experiences, something inside me gnaws. Without travel I will fade until I feel like I am dreaming in my waking hours, and dead when I'm asleep.

elements.label: Notoriety
elements.description: People saw things. They might talk to authorities...

elements.label: Lasting Notoriety
elements.description: My reputation follows me wherever I go. It seems some people made sure everyone knows I'm a troublemaker.

elements.label: 兴奋
elements.description:
"我的旅行并不是要去往什么地方，我是为了旅行而旅行。"
罗伯特·路易斯·斯蒂文森

elements.label: A Scrap of Information
elements.description: A hint of something deeper. A promise of something more. A new location or opportunity to discover. Could it be the next step in my travels?

elements.label: Odd Corners
elements.description: Each city has its corners where the peculiar crosses paths the illicit.

elements.label: Cherished Idol
elements.description: What could at first pass for a pile of tiny bones wrapped in red satin cloth is actually some kind of strange doll. Each minuscule bleached bone is tied to another by a blackened waxed rope, through needle sized holes. The actual shape of it is hard to define, except maybe for its vaguely canine skull.
